short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A personalized shopping experience for Rent the Runway

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shop You - Konture helps you quickly discover clothing recommendations that best match your fit and style on Rent the Runway

You no longer need to browse the entire catalogue to find items that are perfect for you. 

To get started:
1. Install Konture and visit Rent the Runway
2. Fill out a quick survey in the Konture banner
3. Explore Kontureâ€™s clothing recommendations personalized just for you!
